name: no internet cowl
notes:
> **warning, there is an error in the pattern us size for the needles is us 6, not us 7 !**

> you can share photos of your cowl on social medias with #nointernetcowl (as soon as you get your internet connexion back, of course !)


**worsted yarn (ex: malabrigo rios)**
- 100gr / 192 m (210 yds) paris night (background color) 
- 50gr / 96 m (105 yds) lettuce (foreground color)

**6 us** / 4 mm needles with 60cm (24”) circular for knitting in the round
4 stitch markers: 1 for beginning of round and 3 for motif markers



this pattern is inspired by the little game on chrome browser when there’s no internet :)
